text: aur ibaraaheem ka apane baap ke lie magaphirat kee dua maangana sirph is vaayade kee vajah se tha jo unhonne apane baap se kar liya tha phir jab unako maaloom ho gaya ki vah yaqeenee khuda ka dushman hai to usase bezaar ho gae, beshak ibaraaheem yaqeenan bade dardamand burdabaar (sahan karane vaale) the
